questions.question: Is the cooperative registered?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the cooperative is registered.

questions.question: What are the full names of the cooperative president?
What is phone number of the cooperative president?
What was the number of men in the Initial membership?
What was the number of women in the Initial membership?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the number of women in the initial membership is at least 30% of the total members

questions.question: This gives the number of Initial membership as
What is the number of the men in the current membership?
What is the number of the women in the current membership?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the number of women in current membership is at least 30% of the total members

questions.question: This gives the number of the total current membership as
questions.recommendation: Ensure the current membership is greater than or equal to the initial membership.

questions.question: Did you hold General Assembly meetings in March & Oct?
questions.recommendation: Make sure cooperative hold General Assembly meetings in March & Oct .

questions.question: Was a financial review presented in the March meeting?
questions.recommendation: Ensure a financial review is presented in the March meeting.

questions.question: Are there records & minutes kept of all the cooperative meetings that are held?
questions.recommendation: Ensure minutes & records of all meeting are kept.

questions.question: Does the cooperative have a Board of Directors committee?
questions.recommendation: The cooperative must have a Board of Directors.

questions.question: How many male members does the Board of Directors Committee have?
How many female members does  Board of Directors Committee have?
This give the total of the Board of Directors Committee as
questions.recommendation: Make sure the Board of Directors committee number is greater than or equal to 5 and it must always be an odd number

questions.question: This gives percentage of the Women in Board of Directors members as
questions.recommendation: Ensure the number of women in the Board of Directors are at least 30% of the total members

questions.question: how many times has the Board of Directors met so far this year ?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the committee meets at least once in each quarter of this year.

questions.question: Does the cooperative have a Supervisory Committee with 3 members who were elected by the General Assembly?
questions.recommendation: Ensure  cooperative has a supervisory committee.

questions.question: how many times has the Supervisory Committee met so far this year?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the supervisory committee meets at least once in each quarter of this year.

questions.question: How many 5 year terms has the Board of Directors Committee been in office?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the Board of Directors committee sits for maximum of 2 terms in Office.

questions.question: How many 4 years terms has the Supervisory Committee Committee been in office?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the Supervisory Committee sit for maximum of 2 terms in Office.

questions.question: Do the cooperative employees have written contracts in accordance with cooperative & Labour laws?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the cooperative has written contracts regarding to the cooperative & Labour laws.

questions.question: Does the cooperative have financial reports for the last year?
questions.recommendation: Make sure the cooperative has financial reports for the last year.

questions.question: Does the cooperative have external audit reports for the last year?
questions.recommendation: Make sure the cooperative has external audit reports for the last year.

questions.question: Does the cooperative have its legal documents?
which of these legal documents does the cooperative have?
options: a copy of the Law governing cooperatives in Rwanda
the code of conduct for leaders and staff of the cooperative
a register of members and their shares
questions.recommendation: Ensure the cooperative has all the legal documents listed in the cooperative regulations.

questions.question: Does the cooperative have financial records in place?
Which of these financial records do you have?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the cooperative has financial records (cherry collection,parchment,cash and labour record books.)

questions.question: What percentage of the total working capital was used to purchase cherry from farmers in the most recent season?
questions.recommendation: Ensure the percentage of the total working capital that was used to purchase cherry from farmers is at least 80%.

questions.question: What was the ratio of cherry to parchment in the most recent coffee season?(How many Kgs of coffee cherries producing 1kg of parchments)
questions.recommendation: Ensure the cherry to parchment ratio is between 4.9 and 5.5  .
